description: This is a Negotiated Request for Proposal (NRPF) for Event Registration Software and Services that will service the management of business to business (B2B) appointment matching, optional activity selection, website development, scheduling support and custom reporting at DC’s domestic and international events.

**Event Registration Software and Services**
=============================================

### Table of Contents

* [Overview](#overview)
* [Event Registration Software and Services](#event-registration-software-and-services)

	+ [Requirements](#requirements)
* [Tender Details](#tender-details)

### Overview

Destination Canada invites proposals for Event Registration Software and Services to support the management of business-to-business (B2B) appointment matching, optional activity selection, website development, scheduling support, and custom reporting at Destination Canada's domestic and international events.


### Event Registration Software and Services

#### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be required to provide event registration software and services for Destination Canada's events. This will include:

* Development of a website for event registration and activity selection
* Implementation of a system for matching B2B appointments
* Provision of custom reporting and analytics tools
* Support for scheduling and event organization

#### Requirements

The software and services must meet the following requirements:

* Support multiple languages
* Integrate with existing systems for appointment scheduling and activity selection
* Provide custom reporting and analytics tools
* Ensure data security and compliance with Destination Canada's data protection policies


### Tender Details

#### Solicitation Number

DC-2023-PO-05


#### Tender Closing Date

2024-02-23T17:00:00


#### Expected Contract Duration

15 May 2024 to 14 May 2027


#### Trade Agreements

The tender is open to bidders who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*
